text: sorry was AFK then and later I forgot to send it :wink:
you need to "focus" on the CM then on the right sidebar you can click on `more` and `make local copy`
Can anyone assist me with a HubSpot CMS mobile navigation issue? I think I found an issue with the built-in flyout code on Android
Doesn't appear to impact iOS users
and it is replicated on Windows by resizing Chrome or using the debug tools to emulate mobile

Go to <http://content.drivendataconsulting.com/> and see in desktop the menu works fine. Go on mobile (by android or by using Chrome debug tools) and you can see that clicking the + and then a child item works fine. Click the "Company" or "Resources" parent item in mobile and then attempt to click a child item. It collapses and doesn't navigate properly. The best I can tell this is a conflict with the tutorial code and the flyout code.
